mapper.select: SELECT out_code , hold_dtl_code , code , emp_id , quantity , getempname(emp_id, #{comId}) empName , created_date , type , getsubcode(type) typeName , status , getsubcode(status) statusName , lot , note , curr_qty FROM outbound WHERE com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY out_code DESC

SELECT ho.hold_code, hod.hold_dtl_code, hod.lot, ho.code, ho.item_code, getitemName(ho.item_code) itemName, ho.quantity hqty, hod.quantity hdqty, getsubcode(ho.type) typeName, ho.type, ho.status, getsubcode(ho.status) statusName, ho.note, ho.created_date, nvl((SELECT max(curr_qty) FROM outbound WHERE hold_dtl_code = hod.hold_dtl_code AND com_id = hod.com_id), 0) currQty FROM holddetail hod left join hold ho on(ho.com_id = hod.com_id AND hod.hold_code = ho.hold_code) WHERE ho.com_id = #{comId} AND ho.status NOT IN('hs03', 'hs01') ORDER BY hold_dtl_code DESC
